text: Andrew "Andy" Whyment (born 2 April 1981) is an English actor. He is best known for portraying the roles of Darren Sinclair-Jones in the BBC sitcom The Royle Family (1999–2000), and Kirk Sutherland in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street (2000–present). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:Actors from Greater Manchester Category:People from Salford
title: Andrew Whyment
